title: 85.5 (LOA)
content:
Calypsa smiles at you. "Actually, I think I have some good news. That reclaimer we hunted may have actually been the last one in the Valley! I've been keeping to my searches and checking with the various villages, but nobody has seen one, or even any tracks, for weeks!" She clasps your hand. "I'm glad we can finally put that chapter of the Valley's history behind us."

Discard Calypsa. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
